divs: sighting detailsi had stopped home during my lunch hour. my husband and i lived in a rural area near benton harbor, mi. only my dog and two cats were home when this happened. i'm not sure if this happened in 1999, or the year 2000. while standing in my kitchen there was a very large explosion nearby. it felt like it was underground or right near the surface. the entire house shook for just a second or two. i grabbed onto the counter to steady myself and my dog who had been standing in the kitchen near me scrambled a bit to steady herself. it felt like someone nearby had either dropped something very large, or something very large had fallen over, or something right on the surface or underground had exploded. after steadying myself i ran outside to look around. i didn't hear or see anything unusual. the area was mostly rural, not many homes nearby. i then went back inside to call my mother-in-law who lived nearby but she was not home. on my way back to work i called my husband to tell him about it. all through the rest of the day i checked the radio on the news, the television and the newspaper. i saw nothing about an explosion. i continued to check about it for the next several days but never found anything. the other day i caught a television story about ufo occurrences. some people in indiana had heard\felt a very large explosion. seeing the show prompted me to check the internet and share my story to see if anyone else had experienced anything similar. thank you, kathleen
